about_the_game:
Welcome to Roodies Factory!

This is the first game in the "Roodies Factory" saga.

Roodies Factory is a first-person horror mascot exploration game. In the game you are the ex-founder of "Roodies Factory" who returns to the factory years after it was abandoned in search of his missing brother...

Explore the abandoned factory, solve puzzles and find out what really happened 3 years ago when the factory was abandoned.

Roodie

Roodie is a tall animatronic clown who can think for himself. He is the main animatronic of Roodies Factory, he is also the most loved animatronic by children.

Characteristics

-Photorealistic Enviroment
-Horror Atmosphere
-Receive calls from NPCs
-Solve puzzles
-Explore the abandoned factory
